title: SMOS Linux 1.3 - Scrypt Mining Operating System
description:
SMOS Linux 1.3:

Catalyst
- Laste version installed - Catalyst 13.12

Web Status
- Added SMOS Logo
- Security protect added (default password:donate)
- Access just via password - To turn off status password, just delete password from file passowrd.txt
- File is placed on home folder. /home/password.txt - shortcut in /smos/status/password.txt
- Access via IP - You can add IP in list.txt, and someone can access to see your status without password. When you login again, he cant access anymore.
- File is placed on home folder. /home/list.txt - shortcut in /smos/status/list.txt
- Restart rig from status (green) - sleeps for 10 second, then restart rig
- Shutdown rig from status (red) - sleeps for 10 secound, then shutdown rig
- Added logout in web status.  - When you logout, nobady cant access to your web status without password.
- Some color changed, and images.
- Mine restart (auto stop and start mining - blue)
- Refresh web status every 15 second (now you dont need to refresh it manuel and overload your status)

Upgrade SMOS manuel from your RIG
- In folder /root/smos/upgrades/ is placed two scripts (check.sh and install.sh)
- You need to run it ./check.sh and you will see is there a new upgrade for SMOS. If there is a new upgrade, you will get message, then if you want run it .install.sh

Copy folder/file over the FARM 
If you want to copy file/folder (/etc/bamt/ or just /etc/bamt/cgminer.conf) over FARM. You can choose on which rigs you want to copy by IP address.
- Script is placed on /root/smos/mining/farm_copy_folder.sh
- Script is placed on /root/smos/mining/farm_copy_cgminer_config.sh
- Script is simple, when you run it, you enter number of rigs. Then just put IP of rig, after ip, its ask password of RIG. If you enter 3 RIGs, script will ask you 3 times IP and password.


Mgpumon
- Fixed port to 8080 when you try to join on some of your RIGs. How to enable mgpumon look it on TIPS (SMOS web)

Gpumon
- Changed text under speed on gpumon Mhs to Khs, it wasnt correct. 

Kernel flag
- It was on tips, but now its by default. 
- Sloved problem with freez, boot.
- You can boot more than 5 cards (if your moatherboard support it)

Boot
- Faster boot
- Image on boot changed, all other bamt image leaved for base.

Cgminer-3.7.2-kalroth and sgminer 4.0.0
- Cgminer kalroth, and sgminer isnt installed by default. 
- If  you want it, you need to install it manuel.
- Cgminer 3.7.2 is default version. This two version is for r9.
- Cgminer-3.7.2-kalroth - Its placed in /root/mining/cgminer-3.7.2-kalroth, and you just need to run script to change your cgminer with this.
- to change it just type /root/smos/mining/cgminer-3.7.2-kalroth/kal.sh
- Sgminer - Its placed in /root/mining/sgminer, and you just need to run scritp to change your cgminer with this.
- to change it just type /root/smos/mining/sgminer/sgminer.sh

Network
- Network manager installed
- Network manager gnome installed
- In folder /root/smos/network/ we added drivers for next cards. Now you dont need to transfer it on your RIG. Just to install it.

e1000e
e2200
e2205
e220X
AR8161 Gigabit Ethernet
AR8162 Fast Ethernet
QCA8171 Gigabit Ethernet 
QCA8172 Fast Ethernet
AR8131 Gigabit Ethernet
AR8132 Fast Ethernet
AR8152 v2.0 Fast Ethernet
AR8152 v1.1 Fast Ethernet
AR8151 v1.0 Gigabit Ethernet
AR8151 v2.0 Gigabit Ethernet
Look list of compat drivers - http://www.smos-linux.org/list


MD5:
247de0da4cdd1e6cc24a70ec677ed347  SMOS-Linux1.3-2GB.img
dd3dc5c63e022153806c1e371b215985  SMOS-Linux1.3-2GB.zip

P.S. Donations are welcome. Enjoy!
